verses.verse: Then Jonah <WH3124> prayed <WH6419> unto Jehovah <WH3068> his God <WH430> out of the fish <WH1710>'s belly <WH4578>.

And he said <WH559>, I called <WH7121> by reason of mine affliction <WH6869> unto Jehovah <WH3068>, And he answered <WH6030> me <WH990>; Out of the belly of Sheol <WH7585> cried <WH7768> I <WH8085>, And thou heardest my voice <WH6963>.

For thou didst cast <WH7993> me into the depth <WH4688>, in the heart <WH3824> of the seas <WH3220>, And the flood <WH5104> was round <WH5437> about me <WH1530>; All thy waves and thy billows <WH4867> passed over me <WH5674>.
And I said <WH559>, I am cast out <WH1644> from before thine eyes <WH5869>; Yet I will look <WH5027> again <WH3254> toward thy holy <WH6944> temple <WH1964>.
The waters <WH4325> compassed me about <WH661>, even to the soul <WH5315>; The deep <WH8415> was round about <WH5437> me <WH5488>; The weeds were wrapped about <WH2280> my head <WH7218>.

I went down <WH3381> to the bottoms <WH7095> of the mountains <WH2022>; The earth <WH776> with its bars <WH1280> closed upon me for ever <WH5769>: Yet hast thou brought up <WH5927> my life <WH2416> from the pit <WH7845>, O Jehovah <WH3068> my God <WH430>.
When my soul <WH5315> fainted <WH5848> within me <WH2142>, I remembered Jehovah <WH3068>; And my prayer <WH8605> came in <WH935> unto thee <WH6944>, into thy holy temple <WH1964>.
They that regard <WH8104> lying <WH7723> vanities <WH1892> Forsake <WH5800> their own mercy <WH2617>.
But I will sacrifice <WH2076> unto thee with the voice <WH6963> of thanksgiving <WH8426>; I will pay <WH7999> that which I have vowed <WH5087>. Salvation <WH3444> is of Jehovah <WH3068>.
And Jehovah <WH3068> spake <WH559> unto the fish <WH1709>, and it vomited out <WH6958> Jonah <WH3124> upon the dry land <WH3004>.
